features.name: Authentication Context
features.description: Global authentication state management using React Context API with localStorage persistence. Provides login/logout functions, user data management, and authentication status tracking. Hardcoded credentials validation (User ID: 1111, Password: 1111).

features.name: Protected Routes
features.description: Route protection component that redirects unauthenticated users to the landing page. Prevents access to protected pages without login.

features.name: Public Routes
features.description: Route component that redirects already authenticated users to the dashboard. Prevents logged-in users from accessing the landing page.

features.name: Login Section Component
features.description: Reusable login form component with comprehensive validation, shake animations for both fields on error, auto-focus on user ID field, Enter key navigation between fields, password visibility toggle, loading states, and integration with AuthContext for authentication.

features.name: Dashboard Page
features.description: Protected dashboard page accessible only after successful login. Displays welcome message with username, logout button, and coming soon placeholder content. Implements logout functionality with redirect to landing page.

features.name: Landing Page with Inline Login
features.description: Main marketing landing page with animated hero section, smooth transition between 'Enter Dashboard' button and inline login form, dashboard preview carousel, feature showcase cards, company information sections, smooth scrolling with Lenis, and responsive mobile/desktop layouts.

features.name: Hero Section Text Animation
features.description: Word-by-word text reveal animation cycling through multiple promotional messages with configurable reveal speed, pause durations, and smooth transitions.

features.name: Login Form Transition
features.description: Smooth animated transition between 'Enter Dashboard' button and inline login form on landing page with fade/zoom animations (0.5s duration), scroll-to-section functionality, and proper animation state management.

features.name: Interactive Dashboard Preview Carousel
features.description: Fixed interactive dashboard preview system with 9 different dashboard options (Overview, Attendance, Incident Management, Leave Requests, Requirements, Ticket Chat, Ticket Status, Time Tracking, Agent Dashboard). Now properly updates preview images on both hover AND click interactions.

features.name: Responsive Header Navigation
features.description: Sticky navigation header with mobile and desktop layouts, scroll-based hide/show behavior on mobile (<768px), smooth scroll to sections, window resize handling, and logo click to reload.

features.name: Smooth Scroll Integration
features.description: Lenis smooth scroll library integration with optimized configuration (1.2s duration, custom easing), gesture support, programmatic scrolling to sections, and proper cleanup.

features.name: Scroll-triggered Animations
features.description: Intersection Observer implementation for animating sections as they scroll into view (highlights, features, benefits, about, footer), with performance optimization by unobserving after animation.

features.name: Mobile Highlights Carousel
features.description: Auto-rotating carousel displaying system highlights (Real-time updates, Simplified workflow, Insightful reports) on mobile devices with smooth opacity and scale transitions every 3 seconds.

features.name: Feature Showcase Cards
features.description: Grid layout of three feature cards (In-Depth Expertise, Customized Strategic Solutions, Data-Driven Insights) with gradient backgrounds (navy, yellow, orange), hover effects, staggered animations, and external links.

features.name: Benefits Section
features.description: Asymmetric 1x2 grid layout showcasing ERManager Implementation & Support and ERTickAPP with alternating color schemes and staggered animations.

features.name: About Section
features.description: Company information section with decorative animated elements (pulsing circles, bouncing icons), two-column desktop layout, and SAP integration badges.

features.name: Footer with Contact Information
features.description: Comprehensive footer with company logo, tagline, contact details (website, phone, head office address, business hours), and rounded-top design.

features.name: Image Lazy Loading
features.description: Image loading state management with fade-in transitions for dashboard preview images to improve perceived performance.

features.name: Form Validation with Shake Animation
features.description: Enhanced form validation with shake animations that move both input fields AND icons together using animate.css shakeX effect. Validates empty fields, displays contextual error messages with red border styling and shadow effects.

features.name: Password Visibility Toggle
features.description: Show/hide password functionality with Eye/EyeOff icon toggle button positioned inside the password input field.

features.name: Keyboard Navigation
features.description: Enter key navigation between form fields (User ID → Password → Login button) for improved accessibility and user experience.

features.name: Loading State Management
features.description: Loading spinner animation during authentication with fade-in/zoom-in effects, button disabling during submission, and proper state cleanup.

features.name: Auto-focus on Form Fields
features.description: Automatic focus on User ID input field when login form appears, and refocus after failed login attempts for better UX.

features.name: Session Persistence
features.description: localStorage-based session persistence that maintains authentication state across page refreshes. Stores isAuthenticated flag and user data.

features.name: Button Component
features.description: Reusable button UI component with variant support (default, outline), size options, and customizable styling using class-variance-authority and Radix UI slot.

features.name: Card Component
features.description: Reusable card container component with header, title, description, content, and footer sub-components for structured content display.

features.name: Input Component
features.description: Reusable text input field component with customizable styling, focus states, and accessibility features.

features.name: Shiny Text Component
features.description: Animated text component with gradient shiny effect for eye-catching headings and CTAs.
